Name: NekoBellow
About the game: NekoBellow is a 2D Bullet Hell Side Scrolling Shoot 'em up game based on Arcade games of the 90's, there are even unique mechanics not seen before in any other game. Story: Once upon a time a cat named Niko and his girlfriend Hikari decided to go on a picnic. They were enjoying a mountain of delicious sushi when suddenly an evil frog, Toshio, appeared and kidnapped Hikari! Without hesitation Niko climbed into his SkyNeko-98 fighter plane and took off after them. Help Niko rescue Hikari in NekoBellow, an exciting new Shoot â€˜em Up Adventure game by MoonSoft Official. Game Mechanics: Select a helper at the start of the game who you can then free in a level to help fight alongside you. You can collect hearts which you can drop onto enemies to recruit them to fight with you. By collecting 20 Point Stamps you can change to a different ShootType. Controls: For Full Screen use F4 Move with the Arrow Keys. Shoot with 'Z'. Drop hearts towards Enemies with 'X'. Hold 'Shift' to slow down. Press 'C' for the Special Attack. Features: Extra Stage Game Genre: Shoot 'em up
